# **Overview**

In this part, the expression factors were inferred from expression matrices for 6 cell types. For each cell type, the number of LVs are shown in the [table](https://xsun1229.github.io/factor_analysis/factors_traits.html#512_expression_factors)

# **Enrichment resutls summary**

    <img src="https://github.com/xsun1229/factor_analysis/raw/master/output/CEDAR_cell_sum_plier_qc_pruned.png" width="80%">
</figure>

</figure>

# **Detailed results for 6 cell types**

## **B cell**

### effectsize fitting summary 

```{r echo=FALSE}
load("/project2/xinhe/xsun/website/factor_analysis/output/summary_resampling_pwy_cedar_bcell.rdata")
DT::datatable(sum, options = list(pageLength =5))
```


### Checking the reverse causality

**The suffix "_reverse" are the results for traits -> LV (using all candidate SNPs after LD Clumping), the suffix "_rremove" are the results for traits -> LV (using all candidate SNPs after LD Clumping but remove the SNPs have fdr < 0.2)**

```{r echo=FALSE}
load("/project2/xinhe/xsun/website/factor_analysis/output/mbe_plier_bcell_cedar_qc_pruned.rdata")
DT::datatable(sum, options = list(pageLength =5))
```

### Effect size plot

<figure class="half">
    <img src="https://github.com/xsun1229/factor_analysis/raw/master/output/effectsize_plier_bcell.jpg" width="100%">
</figure>

### SNP details 

```{r echo=FALSE}
load("/project2/xinhe/xsun/website/factor_analysis/output/snp_details_cedar_plier_cedar_bcell.rdata")
DT::datatable(snp.list.final, options = list(pageLength =5))
```

### Colocalization analysis

#### +-250kb from the target SNP

```{r echo=FALSE}
load("/project2/xinhe/xsun/website/factor_analysis/output/coloc_sum_500kb_cedar_bcell.rdata")
DT::datatable(summary, options = list(pageLength =5))
```

rs80262450,rs140892874, rs6679677(gran, neut, myeloid_wbc,wbc),rs4599108,are the lead SNPs for two association signals.

#### +-500kb from the target SNP

```{r echo=FALSE}
load("/project2/xinhe/xsun/website/factor_analysis/output/coloc_sum_1000kb_cedar_bcell.rdata")
DT::datatable(summary, options = list(pageLength =5))
```

rs80262450,rs140892874, rs6679677(gran, neut, myeloid_wbc,wbc),rs4599108,are the lead SNPs for two association signals.
